description.value: You've learned the cantrips sprites have used since time immemorial. You gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ghost Sound] as primal innate cantrips. If you have the grig heritage, you also gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Detect Magic], and if you have the draxie heritage, you gain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Prestidigitation].
